motivational_quotes: You define your own life always.

Progress, not perfection, is key.

Build your own dreams starting now.
Focus on the good things.
Do what you love often.
Find beauty in simple things always.
Make happiness a definite habit.
Be brave, be kind, be you.
You are capable of amazing things.
Keep your face towards sunshine.
Your journey is uniquely yours always.
Every day is second chance.
Live the life you have imagined.
Make peace with your broken pieces.
Happiness is an inside job always.
Be awesome today and always.
Push yourself, no one else will.
Believe you can achieve it.
Create your own unique sunshine.
Small steps lead to big results.
Do good and good will come.
Success is a journey, not destination.
Today is a new beginning.
Choose kindness above all else now.
Focus on becoming the best version.
Every accomplishment starts with deciding to try.
Challenges make you stronger everyday.

Believe in the power of you.
Keep your head up always high.
Make today count for something.
Choose joy in every situation.
You got this, keep pushing forward.
Be stronger than your excuses always.

Work hard, dream big dreams.

Wake up determined, go to bed satisfied.

Never stop learning new things.

It always seems impossible until done.

Be the change you seek.

Follow your heart's true desires.
Be the energy you want attract.
Life is tough, but so are you.
Your potential is truly endless now.
Start believing in yourself more now.
Do more of what makes you happy.
Dream big, work hard always.
Learn from every single mistake.
You are stronger than yesterday.
Start now, start where you are.
Find strength in your struggles now.
Let your light shine brightly always.
Hard work beats talent always.
Turn obstacles into stepping stones now.
You have the power within you.
Stay focused on your goals always.
Chase your biggest, wildest dreams.
Start today, not tomorrow morning.
Make your own magic happen now.
Action conquers all your fears.
You are worthy of great things.
Let your faith be bigger than fear.
Your attitude is everything in life.
Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
Do small things with great love.
Let your actions speak volumes louder.
Stay humble, hustle hard daily.
Success starts with self-discipline always.
Every moment is fresh start.
Embrace the glorious mess you are.
Find joy in the ordinary moments.
Small progresses add up over time.
Don't wait for opportunity, create it.
Turn your wounds into true wisdom.
Create the life you want now.
Stay positive, stay fighting strong.
Strive for progress, not pure perfection.
Keep going, don't ever stop.
Make today ridiculously amazing always.
Nothing is impossible. The word says I'm possible!
The best is yet to come.
Prove them wrong with success.
Be kind to yourself always first.
Live life with no regrets ever.
Grow through what you go through.
Let go of what holds you back.
Believe in your infinite potential now.
Stars can't shine without the darkness.
You are enough just as you are.
Trust the process, trust yourself.

english_poems: I shot an arrow into the air
To be, or not to be: that is the question
I heard a fly buzz when I died
April is the cruellest month
I, too, sing America
Not waving but drowning
Come live with me and be my love
Tyger Tyger, burning bright
How do I love thee? Let me count the ways
This is the way the world ends
Two roads diverged in a yellow wood
To him who in the love of Nature holds
My heart leaps up when I behold
Sweet is the breath of morn
To see a world in a grain of sand
Howl, for Carl Solomon!
O Captain! my Captain! our fearful trip is done
I met a traveller from an antique land
A bird came down the walk
She walks in beauty, like the night
Shall I compare thee to a summer’s day?
Tell me not, in mournful numbers
Gather ye rosebuds while ye may
Hope is the thing with feathers
They fuck you up, your mum and dad
The curfew tolls the knell of parting day
Beneath those rugged elms, that yew-tree’s shade
Batter my heart, three-personed God
Death, be not proud, though some have called thee
A thing of beauty is a joy forever
I sing the body electric
Let us go then, you and I
Stopping by woods on a snowy evening
Do not go gentle into that good night
He clasps the crag with crooked hands
A slumber did my spirit seal
Twas brillig, and the slithy toves
I wandered lonely as a cloud
hindi_poems: Nanne-munne bacche teri mutthi mein kya hai
Main neer bhari dukh ki badli
Maa mujhe yudh pe jaane do
Bachpan ke din bhi kya din the
Charan dhooli mein uthe ki girun
Jhanjhavaton mein pakkar jeevan aur nikhar jata hai
Koshish karne walon ki haar nahi hoti
Ae bhai zara dekh ke chalo
Kya khoya kya paya jag mein
Sarfaroshi ki tamanna ab humare dil mein hai
Chal padi hun, ab na roko
Khoob ladi mardani woh toh Jhansi wali rani thi
Abke baras bheej bhaiya ko babul
